view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: N Force was an early 1990s publication from Europress Impact that covered the Nintendo range of consoles: NES, Gameboy and SNES. After 12 issues, the magazine was re-launched as SNES Force to cover the increasingly popular 16-bit Nintendo console.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: N Force was an early 1990s publication from Europress Impact that covered the Nintendo range of consoles: NES, Gameboy and SNES.
